author: Special Correspondent
text:
'EnnammaIpppadi

Panreengaleyma' was the second most popular hashtag in India on Twitter on February 23 with a reach of around six lakh, according to a consultant for the DMK campaign.

In a statement, the consultant said that professional agencies were labouring 24x7, employing tools, including social media to set the agenda for the election. Special WhatsApp groups are in place for cadres in every district. A recent ‘missed call campaign’, which would be reciprocated by a voice message from the DMK president M.Karunanidhi, has recorded 30 lakh missed calls already.

Workshops

The party has been organising workshops for party cadres on how to run an integrated campaign, harnessing the power of digital and social media in addition to on-ground strategies. While many figures have floated around on the money spent for the campaign, a senior JWT official, closely associated with the campaign has said that the numbers were a small fraction of the figures floating around.
title: ‘DMK campaign going viral’
